author: Special Correspondent
text:
An association for unemployed youth registered with employment exchange has sent a representation seeking Chief Secretary Manoj Parida’s intervention to prevent the alleged backdoor employment by the Puducherry Government done in violation of Madras High Court order

Order should be adhered to: Sangam

Pudhuvai Velaivaaipagathil Pathindhu Velaiyatror Nala Sangam represented by its vice president S.Arokiadoss pointed out that any order passed by the Madras High Court should be adhered by the government.

And it becomes imperative on the government for strict implementation of such order when it was a party to the proceeding.

“Flouting the specific direction of the court, the Puducherry Government has been appointing/engaging hundreds of people in haphazard manner depriving all eligible candidates” said Mr.Arokiadoss.

The association requested the Chief Secretary for intervention forthwith and to remove all persons who were appointed recently in illegal manner.

Wants Chief Secy. to prevent alleged backdoor employment by the government
title: Plea to prevent ‘backdoor’ employment
